metadata.synopsis: |Lae'zel, who was a companion, is being left behind at the Gith Chokepoint. The remaining companions can react to it (AVATAR are excluded from this VB, so this VB may not play in multiplayer when all characters are avatars.)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Lae'zel is still back there. Should I just abandon her?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: It may not be the best idea.
